name: New Exporter Help
detail: Provides guidance and support for individuals or businesses venturing into international trade and export for the first time.

name: Sell Your Products Online
detail: Digital platform that empowers businesses and individuals to effortlessly showcase and sell their products on the internet

name: Export Performance
detail: Assessment and analysis of a company or country's success in selling and distributing goods and services to international markets, often measured by factors such as growth, profitability, and market share in foreign markets.

name: Explore Export Markets
detail: Involves researching and identifying international markets for potential business expansion and export opportunities.

name: Exporter Training Services
detail: Offer education and resources to businesses seeking to enhance their knowledge and skills in international trade and export operations.

name: Exporter Capacity Building
detail: Focuses on strengthening the skills, resources, and capabilities of businesses to effectively participate and excel in international trade and export markets.
